settings.text: Give customers details about the banner image(s) or content on the template.

Doubletake is an emerging tennis brand focused on providing thoughtfully designed products that combine uncompromising function with modern athletic style.

We’ve created a vibrant community of tennis players and fans and are looking to collaborate with like-minded individuals to increase our exposure and community.

settings.title: Content Contributor
settings.text: If you create tennis-themed content that deserves a wider reach than your platform alone, we'd love to hear from you. We love featuring relevant and inspiring content from like-minded creators. We'll provide credit for your content and a platform that reaches a diverse, tennis obsessed audience.

settings.title: Fan
settings.text: If you’re obsessed with Doubletake and want to share the love with your friends and family, this is the program for you. When you join our fan program, we'll give you a custom discount code in exchange for regular social media posts that feature your Doubletake bag.

settings.title: Ambassador
settings.text: To become a Doubletake Brand Ambassador, you’ll need a medium size following, a history of posting tennis-related content, and a knack for authentic marketing. Get a free Doubletake bag and insider perks simply by posting about us on social media and passing the word on to your tennis friends.

settings.title: Influencer
settings.text: We’re looking for fashion forward, tennis-playing influencers that take pride in their online community. You have a clear brand story, a loyal following, and a history of posting tennis-related content. Connect with us to chat about benefits, requirements, and more.
